screen.knowledges.config.title: Knowledges

area size

§7Whether to display the informational text

knowledge.knowledges.crosshair.name: Crosshair

§7Indicates if you are looking at a block
or an entity
§cIf disabled, information such as §lblock
breaking progress §r§cand §lentity
health §r§cwill not be displayed
knowledge.knowledges.info.block.name: Block Info

§7Displays information about the block
you are looking at
knowledge.knowledges.info.entity.name: Entity Info
knowledge.knowledges.info.entity.tooltip:
§7Displays information about the entity
